header.title: Dime Sarby and Shaver Gaming Events Planning Meeting
header.purpose: To discuss plans for the Dime Sarby and Shaver Gaming events, focusing on logistics, budget, and promotion.

tasks.Description: Finalize power strip specifications for Dime Sarby car showcase layout.
Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability immediately.
Inform the person who wants to set up a display in the LG Oval zone to stick with the Centre Court for the car showcase.
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut on the sound budget.
Draft the Shaver Gaming media invites.
Lock in Ken Lim's Twitch slot for Shaver Gaming.
Confirm the costume rack specs with TechZone Co. and email the sketch for Shaver Gaming.
Submit the police traffic permit applications for both events.
Follow up with the Fire Department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for both events.
Confirm the delivery date for the VR demo gear.
Map out specific routes and timings with Sebastian for loading and unloading cars and gaming equipment.
Coordinate closely with mall operators to ensure minimal disruption to mall-goers during setup and teardown for both events.
Talk to eSports Channel about featuring a segment on the CYD Nova EV.
Reach out to HyperX and Logitech, the Shaver Gaming sponsors, to explore cross-promotional opportunities.
Chase Asfar on the NUJI store renovation fire safety audit.
Get the NUJI store renovation fire safety clearance sorted.
